body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1078099982 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Groups are a way in Okta to manage people and create scoped sets of rules.

In our case groups are not used for authorization but to create a scope for specific use cases. As we are managing multiple tenants in one Okta tenant this is also a tool to separate tenants.

also see Access and Authorization with IAM module
